Articles.Content:
I have a space station orbiting the Mun that contains a Mobile Processing Lab. I EVA'd a couple of Kerbals into it, but how do I now get them out again?

Edited January 19, 2014 by THobson

Click on the crew hatch and it will give you a list of the occupants with EVA buttons.

Pad.
If you still can't get them out and you're using a mac, click outside the KSP window so that the gray bar on top becomes lighter gray, then click on the crew hatch.

Thanks. I have them now. Silly me I was right clicking. I am using a mac but in full screen mode so there is no outside the window. You may have gathered I am new here. All I need to do now is find out how to change this thread to Answered. Also it would be nice to be able to have look in the Lab

Edited January 19, 2014 by THobson

All I need to do now is find out how to change this thread to Answered. Also it would be nice to be able to have look in the Lab

Edit the first post, then "Go advanced". There you can change that.
